titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation forbidding His Majesties subjects to give assistance to any the subjects of the King of Spain now in rebellion against him
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the seventeenth day of June 1675, in the seven and twentieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
